overview: cloudflare-full: 22 tools; cloudflare_list_firewall_rules -> List firewall rules with filters and IDs for management, cloudflare_create_firewall_rule -> Create custom firewall rule with action and filter expression, cloudflare_delete_firewall_rule -> Delete firewall rule (irreversible), cloudflare_purge_cache -> Purge cache by URLs/tags/hosts/prefixes/everything, cloudflare_get_cache_settings -> Get zone cache configuration, cloudflare_get_ssl_settings -> Get SSL/TLS configuration, cloudflare_update_ssl_settings -> Modify SSL mode (off/flexible/full/strict), cloudflare_list_page_rules -> List page rules with URL patterns/actions/IDs, cloudflare_create_page_rule -> Create page rule for URL pattern with actions, cloudflare_delete_page_rule -> Delete page rule (irreversible), cloudflare_list_workers -> List deployed Workers scripts with IDs, cloudflare_get_worker -> Get Worker script content by name, cloudflare_deploy_worker -> Deploy/update Worker script with JavaScript, cloudflare_delete_worker -> Delete Worker script (irreversible), cloudflare_list_kv_namespaces -> List Workers KV namespaces with IDs, cloudflare_create_kv_namespace -> Create Workers KV namespace for storage, cloudflare_write_kv -> Write key-value pair to KV namespace, cloudflare_read_kv -> Read value by key from KV namespace, cloudflare_delete_kv -> Delete key from KV namespace (irreversible), cloudflare_list_kv_keys -> List keys in KV namespace with prefix filter, cloudflare_get_account -> Get account details/name/settings/capabilities, cloudflare_get_zone_analytics -> Get zone analytics for traffic/requests/bandwidth
